sqlMap.select:
select * from employee_basic_info where 1=1
EMPLOYEENAME=#name# or EMPLOYEEID=#name#
ORDER BY EMPLOYEENAME

select * from employee_basic_info where 1=1
(EMPLOYEENAME=#employeeId# OR EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId#)
ENTRYDATE >= #startDate#
ENTRYDATE <= #endDate#
ORGANIZATIONALUNIT6=#organizationalUnit6#
(FIRSTSKILL=#firstSkill# OR SECONDSKILL=#firstSkill#)
ORDER BY EMPLOYEENAME
select * from employee_basic_info where CHINABANKNAME=#chinaBankName#
sqlMap.update: update employee_basic_info set EMPLOYEENAME=#employeeName#, EMPLOYEEGENDER=#employeeGender#, ENTRYDATE=#entryDate#,COMMONPOSITION=#commonPosition#, COSTCENTER=#costCenter#,ORGANIZATIONALUNIT3=#organizationalUnit3#, PERSONNELRANGE=#personnelRange#,WORKPLACETEXT=#workPlaceText#, PERSONNELSUBRANGE=#personnelSubRange#,DRIVINGAGEMONTH=#drivingAgeMonth#, WORKINGAGEYEAR=#workingAgeYear#,EMPLOYEEGROUP=#employeeGroup#, EMPLOYEESUBGROUP=#employeeSubGroup#,RANK=#rank#, EDUCATIONA=#educationa#,SPECIALTYNAME=#specialtyName#, COMPANYMAILBOX=#companyMailBox#,MOBILENUMBER=#mobileNumber#, CREDENTIALSTYPE=#credentialsType#,CREDENTIALSNUMBER=#credentialsNumber#, ORGANIZATIONALUNIT4=#organizationalUnit4#,ORGANIZATIONALUNIT5=#organizationalUnit5#, ORGANIZATIONALUNIT6=#organizationalUnit6#,GRADUATIONDATE=#graduationDate#, GRADUATIONSCHOOLORCITY=#graduationSchoolOrCity#,ITSAFFILIATES=#itsaffiliates#, CONTRACTWAGES=#contractWages#,SOCIETYINDEMNIFICATION=#societyindemnification#, FIRSTSKILL=#firstSkill#,SECONDSKILL=#secondSkill#,SKILLDESCRIPTION=#skillDescription#, CHINABANKNAME=#chinaBankName#,BECHECK4GAP=#beCheck4Gap# where EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT ORGANIZATIONALUNIT6 FROM EMPLOYEE_BASIC_INFO WHERE ORGANIZATIONALUNIT6 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ORGANIZATIONALUNIT6
SELECT DISTINCT FIRSTSKILL FROM EMPLOYEE_BASIC_INFO WHERE FIRSTSKILL IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT SECONDSKILL FROM EMPLOYEE_BASIC_INFO WHERE SECONDSKILL IS NOT NULL
SELECT EMPLOYEENAME FROM EMPLOYEE_BASIC_INFO WHERE RANK=#rank#
select EMPLOYEEID,EMPLOYEENAME from employee_basic_info where BECHECK4GAP= '0' or BECHECK4GAP is null ORDER BY EMPLOYEENAME

select * from employee_relegation_info where 1=1
(EMPLOYEENAME=#employeeName# OR EMPLOYEEID=#employeeName#)
OUTSCENEESTIMATEDATE >= #estimateLDateS#
OUTSCENEESTIMATEDATE <= #estimateLDateE#
PROJECTMANAGER=#projectManager#
WORKSTAUS=#workstaus#
BUSINESSLINE=#businessLine#
ORDER BY EMPLOYEENAME
sqlMap.update: update employee_relegation_info set EMPLOYEEID=#employeeIdNew#,EMPLOYEENAME=#employeeName#,PROJECTDIRECTOR=#projectDirector#,PROJECTMANAGER=#projectManager#, PROJECTLEADER=#projectLeader#,GRADE=#grade#,WORKSTAUS=#newWorkstatus#,BUSINESSLINE=#businessLine#,BELONGEDTSPROJECT=#newProName#, ADMITTANCEFREEDATE=#admittancefreeDate#,ADMITTANCEBILLINGDATE=#admittancebillingDate#,OUTSCENEESTIMATEDATE=#outsceneestimateDate#, OUTSCENEREALITYDATE=#outscenerealityDate#,BELONGEDTSPROJECTID=#belongedTSprojectId#,EMPOPERATE=#empOperate#, COMPANY=#company#,SKILL=#skill#,RATE=#rate# where EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId# AND WORKSTAUS=#workstaus# AND BELONGEDTSPROJECT=#belongedTSproject#
sqlMap.delete: delete from employee_relegation_info where EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId# AND WORKSTAUS=#workstaus# AND BELONGEDTSPROJECT=#belongedTSproject#
sqlMap.select: select * from employee_relegation_info where EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId# AND WORKSTAUS=#workstaus# AND BELONGEDTSPROJECT=#belongedTSproject#
select * from employee_relegation_info where EMPLOYEENAME=#employeeName# AND WORKSTAUS=#workstaus# AND BELONGEDTSPROJECT=#belongedTSproject#
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE_RELEGATION_INFO WHERE WORKSTAUS='2' AND BELONGEDTSPROJECT=#proName#

SELECT T.BUSINESSLINE,COUNT(DISTINCT T.EMPLOYEEID) AS EMPCOUNT FROM( SELECT BUSINESSLINE,EMPLOYEEID FROM EMPLOYEE_RELEGATION_INFO ERI WHERE ERI.WORKSTAUS='0' OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='4'OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='6'OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='8' OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='2'OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='9'OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='13'OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='15' OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='16'OR ERI.WORKSTAUS='12' ) T WHERE T.BUSINESSLINE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY T.BUSINESSLINE

SELECT DISTINCT T.EMPLOYEEID,T.SKILL FROM EMPLOYEE_RELEGATION_INFO T WHERE T.BUSINESSLINE=#businessLine# AND ( WORKSTAUS='0' OR WORKSTAUS='4'OR WORKSTAUS='6'OR WORKSTAUS='8' OR WORKSTAUS='2'OR WORKSTAUS='9'OR WORKSTAUS='13'OR WORKSTAUS='15' OR WORKSTAUS='16'OR WORKSTAUS='12')
SELECT DISTINCT T.EMPLOYEEID,T.SKILL FROM EMPLOYEE_RELEGATION_INFO T WHERE T.BUSINESSLINE=#business# AND T.WORKSTAUS=#status#
SELECT DISTINCT T.BUSINESSLINE FROM EMPLOYEE_RELEGATION_INFO T WHERE T.BUSINESSLINE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T.BUSINESSLINE

select * from employee_pasvacation_info where 1=1
(EMPLOYEENAME=#employeeName# OR EMPLOYEEID=#employeeName#)
PSADATE >= #startDate#
PSADATE <= #endDate#
DEPARTMENTNAME=#departmentName#
LEAVETYPENAME=#leaveTypeName#
ORDER BY EMPLOYEENAME,PSADATE
select * from employee_pasvacation_info where EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId# and PSADATE=#psaDate#
sqlMap.delete: delete from employee_pasvacation_info where EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId# and PSADATE=#psaDate#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENTNAME FROM EMPLOYEE_PASVACATION_INFO WHERE DEPARTMENTNAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DEPARTMENTNAME

select * from employee_resignation_info where 1=1
(EMPLOYEENAME=#employeeName# OR EMPLOYEEID=#employeeName#)
RESIGNATIONDATE >= #startDate#
RESIGNATIONDATE <= #endDate#
DEPARTMENT=#department#
ORDER BY EMPLOYEENAME
sqlMap.update: update employee_resignation_info set RESIGNATIONREASONS=#resignationReasons#, INITIATIVEORPASSIVE=#initiativeOrPassive# where EMPLOYEEID=#employeeId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT FROM EMPLOYEE_RESIGNATION_INFO WHERE DEPARTMENT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DEPARTMENT
select * from customer_quote_info where CUSTOMERNAME=#customerName#
SELECT DISTINCT CUSTOMERNAME FROM CUSTOMER_QUOTE_INFO ORDER BY CUSTOMERNAME

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE_CHANGE_RECORD T WHERE T.BUSINESSLINE=#businessLine#
T.UPDATETIME > #updateTime#
ORDER BY T.UPDATETIME
SELECT * FROM EMP_RELSTA_HIS T WHERE T.STAYEARMONTH=#yearAndMonth# AND T.STAWEEK=#week#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM EMP_RELSTA_HIS T WHERE T.STAYEARMONTH=#yearAndMonth# AND T.STAWEEK=#week#
